description:
A couple works hard but is still poor, and meets the new year with a sigh. On new years, a man can`t sell his hemp so he trades it for an umbrella. An honest cow-herd meets a strange monster who can read thoughts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oomisoka no Kaneuma / Kasa Jizou / Odote-sama
The Gold Horse of New Year`s Eve / The Jizo Statue with the Hat / Odote-sama
大みそかの金馬 / 笠地蔵 / おドテさま
